results.description: Core: long stocks with recent revenue increases. Applied SUGGESTION1 using revenue and enterprise_value; SUGGESTION3 applied ts_backfill(revenue,4) because coverage=0.5; SUGGESTION4 used a high userCount field (revenue) to boost signal. KEEP_IN_MIND1-4 respected (implementation short, ≤7 operators, ≤2 datafields, no GROUP alone). Confidence: 0.7

Core: rank operating_income growth scaled by enterprise_value. Used operating_income (very high userCount) and enterprise_value (high userCount). ts_backfill applied to operating_income. Kept operators ≤7 and datafields=2. Confidence: 0.75

Core: prefer firms converting capex into sales (sales / capex). SUGGESTION1 used two fields; ts_backfill applied to capex; both fields have high userCount. Implementation compact and meets KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence: 0.65
Core: cashflow / enterprise_value to find cheap cash-generators. Used cashflow and enterprise_value (both high userCount). ts_backfill used on cashflow. Meets operator/data limits. Confidence: 0.78
Core: increase in long-term debt relative to equity (short if leverage rises sharply). Used debt_lt and equity; ts_delta to detect spike and ts_backfill for both. Two datafields only. Confidence: 0.6

Core: ts_delta(gross profit) / revenue to capture improving margins. Used fnd6_newa1v1300_gp (gross profit) and revenue, applied ts_backfill to both. Suggestion4 applied by choosing revenue with high userCount. Confidence: 0.67
Core: recent increases in ebitda predict upside. Used ts_zscore of ts_delta(ebitda,4). SUGGESTION1 single-field momentum; ts_backfill applied. Kept simple. Confidence: 0.7

Core: higher operating_income / icaptq indicate quality. Used operating_income and fnd6_newqv1300_icaptq (invested capital quarterly); ts_backfill on icaptq due to coverage. Two fields only. Confidence: 0.72
Core: ts_zscore(ts_delta(sales,4)) to capture persistent sales momentum. Used sales (high userCount). ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). Confidence: 0.66
Core: ts_delta(eps,4) zscored to favor accelerating EPS. Used eps (high userCount) and ts_backfill. Simple and within operator/data limits. Confidence: 0.7
Core: bookvalue_ps / enterprise_value as cheapness signal. Both fields high userCounts; ts_backfill applied to bookvalue_ps. Two datafields, few operators. Confidence: 0.73
Core: cashflow minus capex to find cash-generative firms. Applied SUGGESTION1 with cashflow and capex and ts_backfill for both. Kept ≤2 datafields. Confidence: 0.7
Core: negative gap between net income and cashflow signals mean reversion. Implementation uses income and cashflow, ts_delta and subtract. ts_backfill for coverage. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Revenue surprise proxy: revenue - sales_ps (per share)
results.description: Core: growth in revenue per share vs prior indicates earnings surprise. Used revenue and sales_ps; ts_delta on sales_ps and ts_backfill both. Two fields only. Confidence: 0.6

Core: recent repurchases (total shares repurchased) scaled by market cap. Used fnd6_newqv1300_cshopq and enterprise_value; ts_backfill applied to repurchases. High userCount of EV used. Confidence: 0.64
Core: operating_income growth faster than revenue growth signals operating leverage. Used operating_income and revenue; applied ts_delta and ts_backfill to both. Two fields only. Confidence: 0.68
Core: reduction in long-term debt (ts_delta negative) is credit-positive. Used debt_lt with ts_delta and ts_backfill. Single field; simple. Confidence: 0.55
Core: decreases in inventories relative to sales indicate improving demand. Used fnd6_newqv1300_invtq and sales; ts_backfill both. Two fields. Confidence: 0.59
Core: falling SGA expense (sga_expense) relative to sales signals margin improvement. Used sga_expense and sales; ts_backfill both. Confidence: 0.6
Core: large goodwill relative to equity flags impairment risk; short high goodwill/equity. Used goodwill and equity; ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.5
Core: increasing r&d spend (fnd6_newa2v1300_xrd) relative to revenue indicates investment-led growth. Used xrd and revenue; ts_backfill both. Confidence: 0.58
Core: large changes in deferred tax (fnd6_txndb) indicate accounting shifts. Used txndb and income; ts_backfill applied. Two fields. Confidence: 0.45
Core: ts_delta(cashflow / operating_income) to find improving cash conversion. Used cashflow and operating_income; ts_backfill both. Confidence: 0.7
Core: ts_delta(sales_ps,4) zscore favors accelerating per-share sales. Used sales_ps only with ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied (sales_ps decent userCount). Confidence: 0.63
Core: divergence between operating income before depreciation and ebitda signals adjustments. Used fnd6_oibdps and ebitda; ts_backfill both. Two fields only. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Market capitalization momentum via enterprise_value change
results.description: Core: ts_delta(enterprise_value,4) to capture market-driven momentum; used enterprise_value (high userCount) and ts_backfill. Simple. Confidence: 0.6
Core: low EV/sales indicates value. Used enterprise_value and sales, ts_backfill sales. SUGGESTION4 leveraged sales high userCount. Confidence: 0.72
Core: ts_std_dev(ts_backfill(eps,60)) high indicates unstable earnings; short unstable. Used eps only; ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.52
Core: cash relative to enterprise_value to find deeply liquid firms. Used cash and enterprise_value; ts_backfill cash. Confidence: 0.74
Core: rising receivables relative to sales signals weakness; use fnd6_rectr and sales, ts_backfill both. Two fields. Confidence: 0.55

Core: normalize(operating_income / revenue) cross-sectionally to find margin leaders. Applied normalize and divide; used operating_income and revenue. ts_backfill applied. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.69

results.idea: Capital expenditure cut as cash saving signal
results.description: Core: big negative ts_delta(capex) indicates saving; used capex only with ts_delta and ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: capex has high userCount so higher confidence. Confidence: 0.66
Core: high debt / ebitda signals reversion/credit risk. Used debt and ebitda; ts_backfill both. Two fields only. Confidence: 0.6
Core: liquidity measure using current assets and liabilities. Used assets_curr and liabilities_curr with ts_backfill both. Simple and within limits. Confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Deferred revenue surge as forward-looking demand
results.description: Core: rising deferred revenue (fnd6_drlt) may indicate future revenue; used drlt with ts_delta and ts_backfill. Single field. Confidence: 0.54

Core: spikes in common shares issued (fnd6_newqv1300_cshiq) indicate dilution; short those with rising issuance. Used field with ts_delta and ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.5

results.idea: Operating expense control: decrease in xopteps proxy

Core: ts_delta(pretax income) zscore to capture accelerating pre-tax profits. Used fnd6_pi (pretax income) with ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.66
Core: high sales per PP&E indicates asset-light model. Used revenue and ppent; ts_backfill applied to ppent. Two fields. Confidence: 0.7
Core: ts_delta(income_beforeextra,4) to find firms with improving recurring earnings. Used high userCount income_beforeextra and ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.68

results.idea: High market value growth vs fundamentals

Core: rising preferred dividends in arrears (fnd6_dvpa) signals distress; short. Used ts_delta and ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.45

Core: sudden increases in accrued expenses (fnd6_xacc) may signal liabilities; ts_delta and ts_backfill used. Confidence: 0.5
